newsitem.title: USA: Quest Medical says co is not for sale.
newsitem.headline: Quest Medical says co is not for sale.

text.p: Quest Medical Inc's board of directors said Friday that the company is not for sale.
On Wednesday, Cypress Asset Management Inc, a Houston-based investment adviser and Quest shareholder, urged Quest to seek a suitable merger partner.
Cypress holds a 6.5 stake in the Dallas-based health care products manufacturer.

The board said it supported its management's decision to build Neuromed's infrastructure at the expense of short-term profits. The board said it believes that this strategy will maximize long-term value for shareholders.
The Neuromed subsidiary manufactures spinal cord stimulation devices.
"Quest's Board has discussed Cypress Management's criticism and suggestions and intends to respond directly to Cypress in the near future," Richard Gilleland, Quest Medical's chairman.
